## EditorApi.setAutocompleteTriggerStrings() method

Set the keys that when typed will automatically open the autocomplete menu

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAutocompleteTriggerStrings(autocompleteTriggerStrings: string[]): void;
```
